ROOT:
SELECT * FROM ADMINISTRATOR.EMPLOYEE WHERE JOB = @JOB AND COMM = @COMM1 AND EMPNO IN (SELECT EMPNO FROM ADMINISTRATOR.EMPLOYEE WHERE COMM = @COMM2) AND SEX IN (@P1,@P2) ORDER BY
JOB,String,CLERK
COMM1,Decimal,2301.00
COMM2,Single,2301.00
P1, Char, M
P2, Char, F
COLUMN,EMPNO
SEQUENCE,DESC
